prHeadline: Tantech Subsidiary to Accept Customer Orders in July for its Innovative Driverless and Autonomous Street Sweeper
headlineTxt: Jun 24, 2021, 08:30 ETTantech Subsidiary to Accept Customer Orders in July for its Innovative Driverless and Autonomous Street Sweeperintelligent route learning and memory, and real-time deep learning, in order to facilitate assisted driving or driverless driving. Lidar-based, machine vision technology will enable the driverless model to safely and accurately operate in common environments. The sweeper has two primary operating modes,More news about: Tantech Holdings Ltd.
